channel.title: Redmi Turbo 5 MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater
channel.description: Your best website to track MIUI ROM releases!

image.title: Redmi Turbo 5 MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI OS3.0.18.0.WPJCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi Turbo 5 China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Turbo 5 China

Codename: klee

Version: OS3.0.18.0.WPJCNXM | 16.0

Size: 10.2 GB

MD5: 84e31f1e184b4d5996d6857d1e11e2a8

Changelog:
[Xiaomi Hyper XiaoAi]
New: Xiaomi Hyper XiaoAi can recognize what's on screen when you're planning a trip and set a countdown reminder for when ticket sales start
*Calendar must be updated to V17.0.7.4 or later
*Xiaomi Hyper XiaoAi must be updated to V7.11.10 or later
[System]
New: Support for the automatic reverse charging cable. Plug it in to start high power reverse charging automatically.
[Camera]
New: Dual video recording option
Optimization: Top panel feature customization
Optimization: Image quality in WeChat
[Other]
Fix: Back light turned on unexpectedly during Honor of Kings replays

Download: Here
